title: Definition of logical functions
text: A logical function evaluates an expression and returns a Boolean value, meaning either true or false. Can you think of a function that checks a condition?

title: How the function is used
text: In programming, this function is used to direct the flow based on a condition. It involves 'if', 'then', and 'else' components. Which function could this be?

title: Function control flow
text: The function you are thinking of starts with the letter 'i' and is often used to determine what happens in cases of different outcomes.
